entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
